title: Seawatch
creator_credit: Kingcroft Productions, Film Australia and Peter Johnson
brief_description: A comprehensive view of the Australian Navy in action. The Navy is seen at work both above and below water in a series of exercises that leave little doubt of the strength and ability of Australia’s naval defences for the ‘80’s.
creator_credit_for_label: Kingcroft Productions, Film Australia and Peter Johnson
